casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robin Medford JONES. No. 435P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, for State. Reita P. Pendry, for Jones.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 30th day of October 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
